column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " So once I knew the truth , I could n't sit by and do nothing . "
#Text=Tonraq says : " My own brother betrayed me .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I 've been running from my past for too long .
#Text=It 's time to put my brother in his place .
#Text=" Rebel leader says : " You have our support , Chief Tonraq .
#Text=" Korra says : " Mine too .
#Text=I 'll be proud to fight alongside you , Dad .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " No , Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " But you said the South does n't stand a change against Unalaq 's forces .
#Text=I can help .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " The best way for you to help is by getting the president of the United Republic on our side .
#Text=The South can give Unalaq a good fight for a while .
#Text=But we 'll need the United Forces in order to win this war .
#Text=" Korra says : " All right , I 'll get you all the help you need .
#Text=I love you , Dad .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I love you , too .
#Text=" Bolin says : " I really need to thank you , Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " For what ?
#Text=I started a civil war .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Exactly !
#Text=Now Eska and I are officially broken up .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Oh , looks like we have company !
#Text=And not the fun kind !
#Text="
